医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
GluFormer 在预测血糖水平方面优于现有的人工智能模型研究引入了 GluFormer，一种基于变压器的生成模型，可使用连续血糖监测数据预测血糖模式，对糖尿病管理和治疗策略具有重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/GluFormer-outperforms-existing-AI-models-in-predicting-blood-sugar-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/GluFormer-outperforms-existing-AI-models-in-predicting-blood-sugar-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74abce15-d592-4755-b3f1-8ad879c16c12 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 22:33:00 -0400 GluFormer outperforms existing AI models in predicting blood sugar levels
FDA 批准的医疗人工智能设备中近一半缺乏临床验证数据人工智能 (AI) 在医疗保健领域实际上具有无限的应用，从 MyChart 中自动起草患者消息到优化器官移植和提高肿瘤切除准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Almost-half-Of-FDA-approved-medical-AI-devices-lack-clinical-validation-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Almost-half-Of-FDA-approved-medical-AI-devices-lack-clinical-validation-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cd334f7-8e86-46ad-b088-c077cfba7b3d Mon, 26 Aug 2024 22:03:00 -0400 Almost half of FDA-approved medical AI devices lack clinical validation data
美国成年人的烦躁现象有多常见？与之相关的因素有哪些？美国成年人的易怒程度较高，与抑郁、焦虑和自杀念头的风险增加有关，这对心理健康评估具有重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/How-common-is-irritability-in-US-adults-and-what-factors-are-linked-to-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/How-common-is-irritability-in-US-adults-and-what-factors-are-linked-to-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddf65b4f-0540-4d2b-aa9d-1b6ad8c7b4f3 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 21:48:00 -0400 How common is irritability in U.S. adults and what factors are linked to it?
探索通过非认知症状早期发现阿尔茨海默病该文章对阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 进行了全面检查，强调早期检测至关重要，因为该疾病会经历从正常认知到轻度认知障碍 (MCI) 直至最终痴呆的各个阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Exploring-early-detection-of-Alzheimers-disease-through-non-cognitive-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Exploring-early-detection-of-Alzheimers-disease-through-non-cognitive-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20efbc0f-a6a5-4089-8712-03db1c7eaa71 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 21:19:00 -0400 Exploring early detection of Alzheimer's disease through non-cognitive symptoms
许多父母希望获得有关预防儿童遗传性健康状况的指导许多家庭不希望将健康问题遗传给子孙。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Many-parents-want-guidance-on-preventing-hereditary-health-conditions-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Many-parents-want-guidance-on-preventing-hereditary-health-conditions-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffb0d980-5a47-4ebf-8b72-72d6756555c6 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 21:02:12 -0400 Many parents want guidance on preventing hereditary health conditions in children
加拿大波瓦桑病毒呼吁在诊断蜱传脑炎时提高警惕CMAJ 的案例研究表明，随着波瓦桑病毒等蜱传病毒在加拿大的增加，临床医生应考虑脑炎患者的这些感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Powassan-virus-in-Canada-calls-for-greater-vigilance-in-diagnosing-tick-borne-encephalitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Powassan-virus-in-Canada-calls-for-greater-vigilance-in-diagnosing-tick-borne-encephalitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aef644a0-4bfb-4e7f-b561-21a31a801353 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 20:58:08 -0400 Powassan virus in Canada calls for greater vigilance in diagnosing tick-borne encephalitis
对私人诊所的资助未能改善低收入群体白内障手术的机会根据 CMAJ 发表的新研究，尽管私人营利性诊所的白内障手术资金增加，但低收入人群接受手术的机会却下降了 9%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Funding-boost-for-private-clinics-fails-to-improve-cataract-surgery-access-for-low-venue-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Funding-boost-for-private-clinics-fails-to-improve-cataract-surgery-access-for-low-venue-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=787f6907-98d2-4907-b6b9-0b771f53a786 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 20:53:10 -0400 Funding boost for private clinics fails to improve cataract surgery access for low-income groups
人们对迷幻药作为潜在的成瘾疗法重新产生了兴趣多年来，迷幻物质一直被视为危险的“派对毒品”，作为成瘾疗法，迷幻物质正重新受到关注，但根据发表在《酒精与毒品研究杂志》上的一系列新的特别文章，还需要进行更多的研究。在罗格斯大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Renewed-interest-in-psychedelics-as-潜在-成瘾-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Renewed-interest-in-psychedelics-as-潜在-成瘾-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b43b4f8-9cfb-444c-972d-96230a10c7b3 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 20:38:03 -0400 Renewed interest in psychedelics as potential addiction therapies
俄克拉荷马大学研究人员获得美国国立卫生研究院资助探索天然癌症治疗方法如今，大约 25% 被批准用于治疗癌症的药物源自大自然——从树皮到海洋生物再到土壤中的细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/University-of-Oklahoma-researcher-receives-NIH-grant-to-explore-natural-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/University-of-Oklahoma-researcher-receives-NIH-grant-to-explore-natural-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b60cad2-6923-43bf-8b61-a1bd9d951472 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 20:27:36 -0400 University of Oklahoma researcher receives NIH grant to explore natural cancer treatments
